name: Tap House 3D: Idle Puzzle
description:
Tap House 3D! is the game that you can play for hours. It might seem like a simple block puzzle game, but let's see whether you can create a house without resetting!

WHY IS THIS GAME SPECIAL?
Press on a block and it flies to its limit inside a field. The trick of the game is to make sure that you actually think about the order in which you press on blocks. If you get one block wrong, it stops all others from being placed correctly. Can you think it through before your first move?

HOW TO PLAY?
1. The only action you can take is pressing on blocks
2. No time limit
3. Try to press on blocks in the right order & create floors for your house
4. Solve single floor levels, add them up and get your new beautiful house!
